prompt: Analyze the meeting and suggest what category it falls under

interview-meeting.explanation: Everyday meeting discussion what to work on today, what was done yesterday and any blockers

sentiments.prompt: what is the sentiment of the meeting? answer in one word

likely-hood-of-accepting.prompt: On the scale of 1 to 10, how likely is the person to accept the offer?

summary.prompt: Summarize the conversation for the Hiring Manager

attributes.should_we_hire_the_candidate: Look at the background of the candidate and see if they have worked on Google Cloud and suggest in one word if we should hire them

stand-up.explanation: Meeting someone new and talking about their work

participants.prompt: Name all the participants of the meeting

duration.prompt: Estimate the duration of the meeting in minutes
